modName: Alternative Tattoo For TnT Athena Model
summary: A New Tattoo Texture, i made for the TnT Athena Model we all have come to love. Adds a trampstamp on the back, and purple heart on the hip...
descriptionHtml:
First Thank You to Team TnT For their most awesome TnT Athena Mod, which in my opinion is the best nude mod out there. That being said, since this is for their model, you will need their mod first: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3844

Now this mod is a simple retexture to add two tattoos to the TnT Athena Body:
1) A black heart Trampstamp on the lower back
2) A Purple Heart on the left hand lower hip

****************
Installation:
****************

extract files to desktop then place femalebody_1.dds in: 

Data/Textures/Actors/Character/Female

backup your femalebody_1.dds before you overwrite

overwrite & enjoy

*********
Notes:
*********

Please DO  ENDORSE TnT Athena by Team TnT for all their hard work, which without i would never been able to make this mod. http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3844

Also If you like this mod, please endorse =D

Also my comp has been derping for a while so i most likely will not be able to get screenies up for a while but i have included them in the file itself. That being said if anyone whose comp is more competent can upload some screenies for me that would be appreciated =D

***********
Credits:
***********

TnT Members
_____________
2pac4eva7
motseer
DorkDiva
Thor925

Thank You Thor925 for allowing me to use their texture.
author: eVulmaNn
